ch.linetic.gesture

Class Joint

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.linetic.gesture.Joint

  • public class Joint
extends java.lang.Object
    This class simply redefine what a point is It is characterize by 3 coordinates : x, y and z It contains some basic operation that are useful for the Analyzers
    Author:
    ketsio
